background_description: The background consists of a dry, granular, sandy-earth surface, characteristic of a bank or shoreline environment. It is mostly uniform in light brown and tan hues.
explanation: The image clearly shows a toad with mottled brown and grey skin. While its earthy tones offer some natural blending with the sandy-earth background, it is distinctly visible due to its shape, texture, and contrast, confirming the absence of active camouflage.
